name: Flipanoid
description:
Flipanoid is the first game I made. It is made using Godot 3.5.

This game is influenced by the classic arcade breakout/arkanoid games but with a twist. The paddle can rotate to expose different colors on top. The aim is to ensure the ball color and the paddle color match for the ball to bounce. 

Play thought 20 fun and sometimes infuriating levels.

Once all 20 levels are complete, a new option will appear which allows you to tweaks game parameters so you can play all over again challenging yourself with different settings.

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/4PzWJBB8PN

Feedback is appreciated.
